Q_DESC:
Create a class called time to denote hours (int), minutes (int) and seconds (float). Also, define the following member functions:

getTime(): to read the time  (hours, minutes and seconds).
addTime(): to add two times and print the resultant time. 

Input:

1.The first line of the input must contain the first time; a single space separated hours, minutes and seconds.
2.The second line of the input must contain the second time; a single space separated hours, minutes and seconds.

Constraint: 0minutes and seconds60
Output:
The output must print the addition of two times. 

Sample Input 1:
22 44 55
12 50 60

Sample Output 1:
Seconds Must be less than 60

Sample Input 2:
22 61 55
12 50 60

Sample Output 2:
Minutes Must be less than 60

Sample Input 3:
35 43 20
120 58 39

Sample Output 3:
156:41:59
